cards.rules_text:
{2}{W}: Reappropriate [i](exile two cards from your hand and/or graveyard)[/i], then choose one plus the number of artifact and/or enchantment cards exiled this way. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Exile target creature you own. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
• Scry 2.
• You gain 3 life.

Hexproof
Creatures you control with converted mana cost, power, or toughness 5 or more can't be the targets of spells or abilities you don't control.
Spells you cast with converted mana cost, power, or toughness 5 or more can't be countered.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Thus I atone for the sins of the Father.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Tap target creature, then draw X cards, where X is its converted mana cost.
cards.flavor_text: [i]As the survivor coalition discussed what to do with her, Tahti sought whatever could distract her from the realizations she knew were coming.[/i]

Whenever Determined to Prevail or another artifact or enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible and vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Forage and check on another outpost. The task was simple, and they hadn't trusted Tahti to do it alone; but for the first time in forever, she felt [/i]strong[i].[/i]

cards.rules_text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn, then untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to pay the costs of its abilities this turn.

Exile up to one target nonland permanent unless its controller pays {1}.
Exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls. Its controller adds {W}{W}. Until the end of that player's next turn, they don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Exile all permanents your opponents control. For each permanent exiled this way, its controller creates a colorless Plains basic land token.
cards.special_text:
Tap an untapped creature you control: Put a loyalty counter on Ivenge. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery spell and only once each turn.
[+1]: Exile up to one target nonland, nontoken permanent until Ivenge leaves the battlefield or you activate one of his loyalty abilities.
[-3]: Exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls. They create a colorless Plains basic land token. [i](It has “{T}: Add {W}.”)[/i]
[-11]: Exile all permanents your opponents control. For each permanent exiled this way, its controller creates a colorless Plains basic land token.

Whenever Scion of the Pack enters the battlefield or one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent or planeswalker, create a 2/2 green Hound creature token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]When Lovi's dogs awoke to their feral nature, they brought others with them.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then rediscover a creature card. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's a creature card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]

Monstrous Amalgam gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

Relic Hoarder gets +X/+0, where X is the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.
Relic Hoarder has first strike as long as you control three or more artifacts and/or enchantments.

Friend of the Woods has hexproof as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Friend of the Woods.

cards.rules_text:

[i]“Endure this new challenge, as we have all the rest. Lovi must break its bones to heal them; soon, the sun will set once more.”
—Vakavanha, Who Sees Anew[/i]
cards.notes: The old Lovi broke the new world apart to make room for itself, and the results were a patchwork of conditions covering all the land; a sun that never rose in one corner, a sun that never set in another.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, can't be the target of spells or abilities you don't control unless their controller controls no untapped lands, and can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls that are able to block it do so.

go-wide arcun

cards.flavor_text: [i]In some places, reality rearranged itself gently, like wind carrying leaves. In others, the old world devoured and transformed the new one like a fire.[/i]

cards.special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Reyhsia, Truth Chaser, you may exile the top card of your library.
[+2]: Each player exiles up to two cards from their hand, then draws that many cards.
[0]: This turn, you may play a card exiled with Reyhsia and spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.
[-10]: Each player exiles all but the bottom card of their library and may play cards they own exiled this way until the end of their next turn.

Kaur, End of Lies costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of nonland permanents your opponents control.
[+2]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield.
[-4]: Exile target noncreature permanent, then reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a permanent card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.
[-12]: Search your library for up to X permanent cards, where X is the number of permanents you control, reveal them, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor_text: [i]The ways of harnessing the earth's power came first to the elderly, forcing any prospective robbers to re-evaluate their priorities.[/i]
